articles.content: Muthoot FinCorp on Tuesday said it has recorded highest-ever loan disbursements in FY24 that rose 18.6 per cent to Rs 61,703.26 crore on a consolidated basis.The asset under management (AUM) stood at… [+1447 chars]

articles.title: Byju’s crisis: Employees grapple with financial distress, humiliation, emotional trauma - Moneycontrol
articles.description: A group of Byju’s employees is planning to take the company to the National Company Law Tribunal, where the edtech firm is already embroiled in legal battles with seven of its stakeholders.
articles.content: Raj, 27, climbed the ranks at Byjus from a sales associate to a team leader in just three years. The latest promotion also came with a hike of 50 percent on his last salary of Rs 8.7 lakh per annum, … [+13891 chars]

articles.author: Kumar Gaurav
articles.title: IRFC Share Price Target 2024: DIVIDEND announcement in Q4 results - Buy? - ET Now
articles.description: IRFC Share Price Target 2024: Axis Securities remains bullish on the state-owned NBFC’s stock after the company posted its quarterly results for Q4 FY24 on Monday. The company, in its financial results, has also announced a dividend reward for shareholders.
articles.content:
Shares of the NBFC have emerged as a multibagger in the last six months by offering a return of 134.98 per cent to its shareholders during the said period.
(Image: istock/ET Now News)
